snippet.title: Tinykin - Official Announcement Trailer | E3 2021
snippet.description:
Announced during PC Gaming Show 2021, watch as a tiny astronaut explores giant household objects with the help of creatures, tinykins, in the upcoming puzzle-platformer, Tinykin. In Tinykin, it's 2748 and Milo has re-discovered Earth except he encounters a problem in that he's as small as a penny, everyone's gone, and it's the '90s. Help solve the mystery when Tinykin arrives on PC in 2022.

#IGN #Gaming #E32021
